Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» Real Time is about a hired killer (Randy Quaid) who gives a compulsive gambler (Jay Baruchel) one hour to live. The film takes place in real time and depict what we do with our time here on earth.
 
 The movie begins with Andy, a hyperactive compulsive gambler, carried away by the calm but powerful Reuban. Reuban tells Andy that he has been instructed to kill him. Andy does not believe him first. He believes that it is only part of Reubans scare tactics to get him to pay his gambling debt. After some kind of skull and a gun in sight makes Andy finally - Reuban going to kill him. But first get Andy one hour in which to do what he wants.
